channel.title: 508 Deveolpment Help
channel.description: I've never worked with a 508 server before and need to know how to do the following: -add custom items -add commands -edit player rights/information -edit xp rate -change where it says butterscape to another name and all that information login box crap If you change help then it would be much appreicated by me

item.title: 508 Deveolpment Help
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

You can’t add custom items.
and maybe never.
Who ever finds out, must be good.
Because, coding in server is diffucult.
Whoever said w/e about login.java
That is for the users or chat
Or Spawn location.
Not Items.

Read full topic
